TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WellKnownServiceTypeEntry extends System.Runtime.Remoting.TypeEntry

summary.span: 存有在服務端登錄為伺服器啟動型別物件 (單一呼叫或單一物件) 之物件型別的值。

span.span: Holds values for an object type registered on the service end as a server-activated type object (single call or singleton).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 伺服器啟動物件型別可以是單一呼叫或單一物件。Server-activated object types can be either single call or singleton. 如果物件類型為單一呼叫，的每當從用戶端呼叫傳入頁面時，都會建立它的新執行個體。If an object type is single call, a new instance of it is created each time a call from the client comes in. 所有呼叫的單一物件是由該物件的一個執行個體都處理。All calls to a singleton object are handled by one instance of that object. 知道的 URI，這個物件的任何用戶端可以取得此物件的 proxy 註冊它使用慣用的通道及啟用物件，藉由呼叫`new`或。Any client that knows the URI of this object can obtain a proxy for this object by registering the channel it prefers with and activating the object by calling `new` or . 請務必注意註冊程序未建立遠端物件本身。It is important to note that the remote object itself is not created by the registration process. 這只有在用戶端嘗試在物件上呼叫方法時執行的動作，或啟動從用戶端物件。This only happens when a client attempts to call a method on the object or activates the object from the client side. 伺服器啟動的物件和啟動遠端物件的更詳細說明，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e90d0c64-00da-4080-ae78-a6c558825c25)。For a more detailed description of server-activated objects and remote object activation, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e90d0c64-00da-4080-ae78-a6c558825c25). ## Examples [!code-cpp[WellKnownServiceTypeEntry_Server#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WellKnownServiceTypeEntry_Server/CPP/wellknownservicetypeentry_server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WellKnownServiceTypeEntry_Server#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WellKnownServiceTypeEntry_Server/CS/wellknownservicetypeentry_server.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WellKnownServiceTypeEntry_Server#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WellKnownServiceTypeEntry_Server/VB/wellknownservicetypeentry_server.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前尚未實作這個索引子，在其上的作業不會產生任何結果。Currently, this indexer is not implemented and operations on it will not produce any results. 內容屬性時，提供內容屬性，加入至內容，可以強制執行同步處理與交易的原則。Context attributes provide context properties that, when added to a context, can enforce policies such as synchronization and transactions.
